SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Technical Support Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 15:00 IST
 Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Kerala |  Salary : 18,000 to 18,000




FOLLOW

Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has officially released the notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, ITI can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. Fr more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Kerala.

SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Technical Support 	01	10th Pass, ITI

Age Limit for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 18,000 /- per month

Application fee for the  SCTIMST Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Technical Support Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility.
Then, attend the walk-in interview at the address given below along with the documents required.

Venue

Biomedical Technology Wing, Satelmond Palace, Poojappura, Thiruvananthapuram-695 012

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in Interview	22-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
